name: Motherless - Season 1
description:
Season 1 is composed of over 10,000 renders, animated scenes, 178 videos, sounds and mini-games that you can play.
You can enjoy over 8 to 10 hours of gameplay totally free of charge!
This story is about Sunny, he was separated from his mother at birth, knowing almost nothing about his past, he will try to find her. Help him find his mother and you will be rewarded during this process.
In this game, you will see how a boy at a young age runs away from his private boarding school in search of his mother. During this search, he will unknowingly work for the woman who took care of him until he was three years old.
You can play the intro or choose to ignore it... I recommend you play it!!!!
You will be able to choose through the relationship manager if you want to follow the path of any character.
The characters in the game have different ethnicities and personalities, so you will be attracted to some of them. Will you be able to ignore them?
The further you advance in the game, the more you will get caught up in the story and each character with their different needs.
The game is a visual novel that becomes more interactive through fun mini-games and hilariously awkward events.
